title: Checkout as a Guest
description: A new customer wants to place an order without creating an account.

tasks.description: Add items to the cart and proceed to checkout.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer is ready to pay.
The customer bypasses the account creation/login step.

tasks.description: Enter shipping, billing, and email information and complete the purchase.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is successfully placed without requiring the customer to create a password-protected account.
